replies.body:
Nar, but to be honest I haven't played the game much since the patch. I've been too busy at work. 

On a side note a little while ago I read a thread on the old forums about how the GFX DLL files in lol where really out dated and followed the instructions on how to update them & the air client. After doing it I got around a 25%-30% improvement in frame rate. I cant remember the thread link but I'm sure you can google around and find it to follow the steps for yourself.
